Package gui

Interface Screen

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultScreen, DialogScreen, SaveBookmarkScreen, SaveHtmlScreen
public interface Screen
An interface so the window can talk to the different screens

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    Draw the current screen
    void execute​(BrowsrOperation operation)
    Execute the Bookmark operation
    void handleKeyEvent​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar, int modifiersEx)
    Handle a key event
    void handleMouseEvent​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifiersEx)
    Handle a mouse event
    void handleShown()
    called on startup and needs to show the welcome document

  • Method Details

    • draw

      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw the current screen
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics needed to draw the screen

    • handleMouseEvent

      void handleMouseEvent​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifiersEx)
      Handle a mouse event
      Parameters:
      id - The id off the mouse event
      x - The x coordinate off the mouse event
      y - The y coordinate off the mouse event
      clickCount - The click count on the mouse event
      button - The button pressed on the mouse
      modifiersEx - The modifier active on the mouse event

    • handleKeyEvent

      void handleKeyEvent​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar, int modifiersEx)
      Handle a key event
      Parameters:
      id - The id off the key event
      keyCode - The code off the key pressed
      keyChar - The char of the key pressed
      modifiersEx - The modifiers active on the key pressed

    • handleShown

      void handleShown()
      called on startup and needs to show the welcome document

    • execute

      void execute​(BrowsrOperation operation)
      Execute the Bookmark operation
      Parameters:
      operation - the operation to execute
